Articles.Content:
hello ladys and gentlemen my name is princess venus and this is a build a colany challenge easy? No why? because its going to be assembled in Jools atmosphere and yes you read me right why? im in need of one because im not in the best of shape to do one alone so i'm makeing it a challenge because it's fun group effot is aloud mods are aloud if mechjeb is being used use 2.0.8 or later intergrated in the pods please its going to be like THAT'S NO MOON youtube series by HOG but to the exstream and not on youtube sadly but have fun and fly safe.

What am i after at this moment you ask mortal:

i'm after the start of any colany a beacon good luk

recomendations:

use the airship mod

have safety rails B9 pack has them

(optional) make a launch rocket back to orbit

(optional) make a hybrid plane/helicopter i forgot that mod pack's name

obay what i asked for please

should not be solar powered
